text: Euphorbia intisy is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Madagascar. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical dry forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==See also== *Madagascar spiny forests ecoregion ==References== intisy Category:Endemic flora of Madagascar Category:Desert flora Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Euphorbia intisy
